Product Description

Please Read Before Purchase!

Please Confrim Your SIM Card’s Compatibility Before Purchasing!

2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B83G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS, H2O Wireless …!

Note:

It will be smoother to use after booting a few minutes.If the elderly use it and need a larger display font, the font can be set to the largest in the background, which is convenient for the elders to use. At the same time, the mobile phone has a children space mode. It can limit the usage time, mobile data and apps, no need to worry that kids will indulge in games, protect their eyes as well.Due to the small memory of the Note 6 cell phone, please close unused programs in time to get a better user experience. For example, when you are not using GPS positioning, please turn it off, then you can get a longer standby experience.

Notice:

If your phone can’t work any other carriers at the first time, you need to activate the sim card on a existing phone which is support you carrier. After you receive the initial activation texts or get 3G signal, put the sim card back into the phone It should automatically pick up the carrier’s network. Or you can contact with the carrier to activate your SIM card.If your Ulefone note 6 can’t connect to data, please input the APN setting by manually, first input Operator SIM and go to settings—>Network&internet—>Moblile network—>Advanced—>Access point Names—>here can be add APN(the‚Äò+‚Äô icon) or change the APN (Edit any access point to change). To find APN parameters you need to manual input, you may ask the shop / website of those Operators, or you can find another handset with a correct working sim card inserted, then use the same path same approach, you can find and read the APN characters of this Operator, and then copy the same character into your note 6.

Note: Please open the back cover of the phone and remove the insulating tape on battery before starting to use. Otherwise unable to charge!

Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1Dual SIM Dual Standby128GB extra storage added via TF card(If you received the phone without insulating tape, that’s because the factory has removed the insulating tape from the battery before shipped.)

Super lightweight and compact, weights only 155g and 8.5mm thickness, golden weight ratio creates excellent holding experience, provide compact and well-balanced look and feel. Hold it in hand comfortably and carry it around with ease.

RAM/ROM: 1GB/32GB (Max. Expansion 128GB)CPU: SC7731E, Quad-core 1.3GHzGPU: Mali-T820 up to 600MHzUSB: Micro USB 5 PinMusic Format Supported: MP3, AMR, AAC, FLACImage Format Supported: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNGDimensions (inch): 6.1″*2.87‚Äú*0.33‚ÄùWeight: 155g/0.34lb

6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full ScreenIPS Screen720*1560 High ResolutionFullview Display92.9% Screen Ratio19:5:9 Aspect RatioSmoother Screen Sensitivity

See The World Through HD Camera

5MP Main Rear Camera

Capturing staggeringly beautiful landscape is a great enjoyment, Note 6 equipped with 5MP main rear camera up to F/2.2 aperture has exceptional vision, helping you discover unusual beauty and assisting you record every beautiful moment for lasting forever.

Superb Front Camera Rejuvenates Your Image with Beauty Mode

2MP camera with HDR and beautify function in the front interprets your features thoroughly and beautifully so as to generate stunning selfies. Whether it is against the background of the mottled tree shadows during the day or the city lights at night, a relaxing shot can amaze your protagonist moments.

Night Mode

Regardless of Light or Shade, The Beauty is Always Clear and Moving

Turn on the night scene mode to automatically optimize the shooting effect, so that the details of the photo are deep and the scene is clear and bright, shooting clear and stereoscopic masterpiece for you.

Latest Android 11 Go Edition OS

Your trendy Note 6 Unlocked Cell Phones, it will run smooth and fast based on Android 11 Go OS out of box, bringing a powerful and smooth experience. Application startup speed has been greatly improved, new privacy protection mechanism adopted will protect your privacy and security.

Mighty Quad-core Processor

Powered by powerful processor with 1GB of RAM + 32GB ROM of internal storage that can deliver sufficient performance for all your apps to run smoothly. Be amazed by the outstanding graphics performance GPU that helps output unparalleled images.

3300mAh Long-lasting Battery

Note 6 equipped with 3300mAh battery makes you know what is last endurance, there is less power consumption even you immerse yourself into hearty games and binge-watching.

But Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA carriers such as Sprint & Verizon. Due to the shutdown of 2G and 3G networks of some carries, the note 6 will cannot be used. Please confirm whether the carries you are using can use it before purchasing.
This is a a very CHEAP and basic mobile phone, therefor it has only 1GB RAM and 32GB ROM. So the speed is slower than other smartphones with 2GB RAM or 4GB RAM. But it ideal as a backup phone for business trips or travel.

From the brand

Ulefone Note Series

Ulefone Armor Series

Ulefone Armor X Series

Ulefone Accessories

How did we get our start?

As early as 2010, with the idea of helping people stay in close contact with others, we started designing and manufacturing feature phones, and then expanded differentiated smartphones.

Why do we love what we do?

Technology makes life easier and more fun. It‚Äôs the millions of Ulefone users around the globe who like our products and inspire us every day.

What makes our products unique?

Every Ulefone product is made with care, and every detail counts to impress our customers. We value innovation, listen to the needs of users, focus on the latest technology.

6.1‚Äù HD+ water-drop display screen, perfect with one-hand set. 155g featherweight, 8.5MM Ultra-slim cellphone.
3 independent card slots for 1* Nano SIM, 1* Nano SIM, 1* TF card(up to 128GB). Note: Please remove the insulating tape before starting up the phone for the first time!
5MP main camera and 2MP front camera
Bands: 2G GSM B2/3/5/8, 3G WCDMA B1/2/5/8, Not 4G. Compatible with most of GSM Carriers such as T-Mobile, Metro Pcs and others. Not compatible with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA carriers such as Sprint & Verizon. This is a 3G smartphone, not 4G. Check compatibility with your local bands before purchase

IMPORTANT NOTES(Please Read Before Purchase!):

Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!

It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS and others!

Please Confirm Your SIM Card’s frequency bands are included in below Supported Bands Before Order:

  • 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
  • 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8

Please kindly note that the Note 6 is designed as a very cheap and basic phone. Therefor it has only 1GB RAM and 32GB ROM. So the speed is slower than other smartphones with 2GB RAM or 4GB RAM.

The Ulefone Note 6 unlocked cell phone is designed as a value-for-money basic smartphone for everyone. Defiantly is the most perfect value-for-money gift for every kids, teenagers, friends, parents and people who never use a smart mobile phone before.

  • These features make the Note 6 stand out from other 3G entry-level smartphones:
  1. Superior to the U-NOTCH SCREEN: Equipped with a 6.1″ Water-drop IPS screen, it produces a 92% contrast ratio, 19.2:9 wide screen display, producing a Full View display.
  2. Better than a DUAL CARD SLOT phone: The TRIPLE card slots allow you to use 1* Nano SIM, 1* Nano SIM and 1* Micro SD (TF) card simultaneously.
  3. Better than a SINGLE SIM phone: The Note 6 is a Dual SIM and Dual Standby unlocked cell phone.
  4. Face Recognition: Get access into your phone quickly. Safe and convenient.
  5. Ultra-Slim Lightweight: Fell more comfortable in your hand.
  6. 3300mAh Battery: With power saving function and optimization of Android 11. You use your phone longer than other phones.
  7. FORGET the EU PLUG: Your package comes with a US plug.
  8. FORGET that CHEAP Transparent SILICONE CASE: Your phone comes with a free but high quality TPU case which would be very expensive if bought separately.
  9. Global 2G and 3G frequency bands: You can take the Note 6 with you anywhere worldwide, as long as the area supports 2G and 3G(does not support Verizon and Sprint in US).
  10. Advanced certifications: CE, RoHS, TAC IMEI, MSDS UN38.3 certificated. Quality is confirmed by these government authorized institutions.
  • What makes us stand out from other sellers:
  1. If you buy a Ulefone smartphone from our Amazon store (Ulefone Direct- US), we will repair or replace any defective device during our one-year promise period.
  2. Our personal customer care support provides a friendly and quick response within 12 hours.

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Fabulous Design

  • 6.1″ Water-drop Big Screen
  • 5MP + 2MP Camera
  • 3300mAh Battery
  • Quad-core CPU
  • 32GB Storage
  • Android 11 (GO Edition)

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with 3-Card Slot Design

  • Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1
  • Dual SIM Dual Standby
  • 128GB extra storage added via TF card

Note: Please remove the insulating tape before starting up the phone for the first time!

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Wider Water-drop In-cell Full-screen

  • 6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full Screen
  • IPS Screen
  • Fullview Display
  • 92.9% Screen Ratio
  • 19.2:9 All Screen Display
  • Smoother Screen Sensitivity
  • 3D Body Curves, Perfectly Suit
  • Slim, Compact Design and Light Weight

Your Cheapest 3G Phone with Android 11 OS

  • Powerful and smooth experience
  • New privacy protection mechanism

Complete and Compact Package of Features within a Single Phone

  • Quad-Core processor, 1GB RAM + 32GB ROM
  • OS: Android 11 Go Edition
  • 3300mAh long last battery ( supports DuraSpeed function to save power )
  • Face unlocking, 0.2s to get access
  • 3D Body curves
  • Hotspot & Tethering, Bluetooth
  • 2.4G Wi-Fi version: IEEE 802.11b / g / n
  • 3.5mm Audio jack
  • Gravity sensor, Proximity sensor, Light sensor
  • Emergency alerts
  • GPS & GLONASS & BeiDou triple navigation systems
  • Supports Whats App, Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Spotify, YouTube, Prime Video, BBC iPlayer,TV Catchup and so on
